description: build: ignore new zfiles, delete temp goplay binary in run.bash

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

please sort the two new files into place in the hgignore file

also, 'rm -f goplay' should suffice. go build writes to the current
directory

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=19591dcb81c6 ***

build: ignore new zfiles, delete temp goplay binary in run.bash
